item.title: Is 99% Good?
item.description: If you ever took at test at school, you’d probably be really happy with getting a 99 grade. After all, it’s almost a perfect score. But when you’re talking about software systems, is 99% availability good? Well, if your system needs to be available 24/7 everyday, 99% won’t cut it. Downtime Table Take a look at the below table.
